summary: New look, weapon useage, fighting style
descriptionHtml:
\"This is the first ever thing I have ever modded
I like Argonians, but found out this stupid looking one was the only follower
so I retextured his skin
He is now black with white markings and silver raptor like eyes
he is now a two handed user
fights like a barbarian
and is essential

originally he was supposed to have bright light blue markings, instead of white. If anyone can fix this that be awesome

Im not the type to say dont use cause well i wouldn\'t put it here if i wasnt
so use, retexture, etc

Just give me the credit of this mod\"
author: justinsilverclaw
